The Cypriot LoCo Team would like to thank you for considering to support the team's efforts, may that be financially or by spreading a good word about the community.
There are a lot of ways to provide financial support, by donating directly or by buying T-shirts. This way you ensure that the Ubuntu-cy continues to do its best.

Currently, we are considering to provide T-shirts for the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CypriotTeam/Events/IntrepidReleaseParty|Intrepid Ibex party]]</nowiki> on the 8th of November 2008.<<BR>>
SVG source is included, click on the picture on the right to get it.<<BR>><<BR>>
Unfortunately, we are physically restricted to provide the T-shirts only to those who attend the party.<<BR>>
'''Update''': Some t-shirts were pre-ordered from the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntucy.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=272|forum topic]]</nowiki> and have already been handed out.
